Package io.mosip.registration.validator

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AuthenticationBaseValidator
    This class will be the base class for all the validator classes like FingerprintValidator, FaceValidator and Irisvalidator
    FaceValidatorImpl
    This class will take the face details from the DB and verify against the captured face.
    FingerprintValidatorImpl
    This class is for validating Fingerprint Authentication
    IrisValidatorImpl
    This class will take the Iris details from the DB and validate against the captured Iris.
    OTPValidatorImpl
    This class will validate the OTP entered by the user by calling the otp service
    RegIdObjectMasterDataValidator
    This class validates the user selected (which is provided by the UI layer) dropdown data against one available at the database layer, which is synced from MOSIP server.
    RegIdObjectValidator
    The class to validate the Schema of Identity Object.
